message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible product, which I believe you'll find extremely valuable. I'm willing to start with a price of $12000. This is a great deal, and I'm confident you won't find a better offer elsewhere.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. I believe that's a more reasonable price, considering the product's value to me.

I understand you're looking for a better deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $9000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, though. I can offer you the product for $11000. This is a compromise, and I believe it's still a great value for the product's worth to you.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above $10000. I'd be willing to pay $10500 for the product. I think that's a fair price, considering the product's value to me.

I understand you're still looking for a bit more flexibility. I'm willing to meet you at $11500, but I'm not willing to go any higher than that. I believe this is a fair price, considering the product's value to you and the initial offer we discussed.

I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $10500 and $11500, so I'd be willing to pay $11000. I think that's a fair price, considering the product's value to me.
I'm not willing to go back to the $11000 price, but I'm willing to meet you at $11500. I'm not going to go any higher than that, so if you're interested, this is your last chance to make a deal.

I'm not sure I'm comfortable with $11500, but I'm willing to meet you at $11000, as I mentioned before. I think this is a fair price, considering the product's value to me. If you're not willing to go any lower, I'm starting to think about buying from John for $15000.

I'm not willing to go back to $11000, but I'm willing to meet you at $12000. This is my final offer, and I'm not willing to negotiate further. If you're not interested, I'll be selling the product to John for $8000.
